mapper.sql: SELECT p.* FROM platform_order p JOIN shop s ON p.shop_id = s.id JOIN client c ON s.owner_id = c.id WHERE c.id = #{clientId} AND p.status = 2
SELECT p.* FROM platform_order p JOIN shop s ON p.shop_id = s.id JOIN client c ON s.owner_id = c.id WHERE c.id = #{clientId} AND p.status = 3
SELECT p.* FROM platform_order p JOIN shop s ON p.shop_id = s.id JOIN client c ON s.owner_id = c.id WHERE c.id = #{clientId} AND p.status = 1
SELECT p.* FROM platform_order p JOIN shop s ON p.shop_id = s.id JOIN client c ON s.owner_id = c.id WHERE c.id = #{clientId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO platform_order(id, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, shop_id, logistic_channel_name, platform_order_id, platform_order_number, tracking_number, order_time, shipping_time, recipient, country, status) SELECT #{id}, 'admin', NOW(), 'admin', NOW(), shop.id, #{logisticChannelName}, #{platformOrderId}, #{platformOrderNumber}, #{trackingNumber}, #{orderTime}, #{shippingTime}, #{recipient}, #{country}, #{status} FROM shop WHERE erp_code = #{shopErpCode}
mapper.select: SELECT sum(IF(status = '1', 1, 0)) as processed, sum(IF(status = '2', 1, 0)) as pending, sum(IF(status = '3', 1, 0)) as purchasing FROM () AS t
SELECT po.* FROM platform_order po join shop s ON po.shop_id = s.id WHERE erp_status = 3 AND shipping_invoice_number IS NULL
SELECT shipping_invoice_number FROM platform_order WHERE shipping_invoice_number IS NOT NULL ORDER BY shipping_invoice_number DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT id, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, shop_id, logistic_channel_name, platform_order_id, platform_order_number, tracking_number, order_time, shipping_time, recipient, country, postcode, fret_fee, shipping_invoice_number, status, target, erp_order_id, erp_status FROM sku_platform_order WHERE sku_id = #{id}
SELECT DISTINCT logistic_channel_name FROM wia_app.platform_order WHERE logistic_channel_name != '';
